title: Portrait of George Roggenbach at age 38
marks:
Inscription

on back, in pencil: [Roggenbach] an
description: portrait of a man with a beard trimmed into two points and a long, thin moustache, wearing a cape and a cloak with puffed sleeves; coat of arms on wall over man\'s PR shoulder; view of a village with a castle on a mountain behind man\'s PL shoulder; text in Greek at bottom
creditline: Gift of funds from John E. Andrus III and other donors and the Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
